verses.verse: And seeing <S%G1492><s%> the multitudes, <S%G3793><s%> he went <S%G305><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain: <S%G3735><s%> and when he was set, <S%G2523><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him:

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> if you bring <S%G4374><s%> your gift <S%G1435><s%> to the altar, <S%G2379><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> remember <S%G3415><s%> that your brother <S%G80><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> ought <S%G5100><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> you;
